title: Strengthening AI practical competencies: Role awareness and learning design simulation for pre-service teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of the teacher role and anticipated experience in educational settings
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and reflect on dilemmas arising during teacher role decision-making processes using simulation tools
Learners can reconstruct their role awareness and develop concrete action plans through peer mentoring feedback
Learners complete educational decision-making simulations with over 80% accuracy and demonstrate growth through reflective journals (3 entries) and peer evaluations (2 rounds)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
